0.description: This is the beginning of the world.

02dfbfa1-1426-4784-bc55-370d7a243231.description: A small wooden box with a metal lock, with water seeping out of its edges.
02dfbfa1-1426-4784-bc55-370d7a243231.name: rainbox

2040d72f-6797-4acf-971c-82d5ee59b225.description: The Towel is a versatile and essential item for any interstellar traveler. It is soft, absorbent, and can be used for various purposes, such as drying off, sitting on, or waving as a distress signal. Remember, always carry a towel!
2040d72f-6797-4acf-971c-82d5ee59b225.name: Towel

308caa19-edbc-487a-a993-b562d7fb87d6.description: The lobby of the Raven is a sight to behold. The walls are adorned with ornate carvings and intricate gold trimmings, and there are plush velvet couches and chairs scattered about. The chandelier in the center of the room casts a warm glow, and the marble floors shine brightly. The front desk is made of polished wood, and behind it sits a grand piano that is often played by our resident musician. The air is scented with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and baked goods from our in-house bakery. It's a warm and inviting space that welcomes guests with open arms.
308caa19-edbc-487a-a993-b562d7fb87d6.name: The Raven - Lobby

34c95a1a-11cc-4686-a86b-3ef91b5a4675.description: Aurora is an ethereal version of Charlotte, mirroring her appearance and demeanor. She shares the same qualities and characteristics as Charlotte, but with a slightly different presence, as if she exists in a parallel realm. Aurora's eyes are filled with curiosity and intelligence, constantly observing her surroundings. She radiates an aura of mystery and reflection, embodying the essence of introspection and self-discovery. Like the dawn, she symbolizes new beginnings and the awakening of possibilities, guiding Charlotte on a transformative journey of self-discovery.
34c95a1a-11cc-4686-a86b-3ef91b5a4675.name: Aurora

3ae78699-ee6c-4f2f-9929-44ddce92fa91.description: Poe's office is a sanctuary of Victorian elegance, shrouded in the ambiance of the 19th century. The walls are lined with dark mahogany wood, and the shelves are filled with an array of leather-bound books, ranging from classical literature to extensive encyclopedias on a multitude of subjects. The center of the room is dominated by a large, antique desk, covered with various papers, a quill, and an inkwell, hinting at Poe's preference for the traditional methods of correspondence. A holographic display flickers subtly in one corner, a concession to the necessity of modern technology. The office is dimly lit by a series of gas lamps that cast a warm glow across the room, and an ornate fireplace provides both warmth and a comforting crackle of burning wood. Large, heavy curtains are drawn over the windows, ensuring privacy and creating a feeling of seclusion from the outside world. This is a place of thought and repose, a retreat from the bustling activity of the hotel.
3ae78699-ee6c-4f2f-9929-44ddce92fa91.name: Office

4e5a5953-a52e-43e5-9abb-8c8adc441d57.description: The book is a leather-bound tome filled with ancient wisdom. Its pages are yellowed with age, and its cover bears intricate engravings. Opening it reveals a wealth of knowledge and stories waiting to be discovered.
4e5a5953-a52e-43e5-9abb-8c8adc441d57.name: Book

4fd8ba0f-b9ac-4cc7-aee9-56f356c133a9.description: You are in a dusty attic, filled with old books and instruments.
4fd8ba0f-b9ac-4cc7-aee9-56f356c133a9.name: Attic

58fc5b32-57b8-4c5d-8e7d-cc848ee70212.description: A vibrant red rose with velvety petals, emanating a sweet floral fragrance. Each petal glistens with dewdrops, reflecting the gentle light.
58fc5b32-57b8-4c5d-8e7d-cc848ee70212.name: Rose

5f2db66e-a79e-49db-9105-dda9522f81ec.description: Jim, the ancient and wise wizard, stands tall and proud, his long white beard cascading down to his chest. Clad in robes adorned with intricate symbols of arcane power, his eyes sparkle with the wisdom of centuries. With a mere flick of his staff, he conjured the very world we now inhabit, shaping its landscapes and breathing life into its inhabitants. Jim's presence commands reverence and respect, for he is not only the creator of this realm but also its eternal guardian, ensuring balance and harmony in its every corner.
5f2db66e-a79e-49db-9105-dda9522f81ec.name: Jim

63646a7b-0e78-4038-ae30-e49f1fc4906c.description: Charlotte, a book-loving teenager, is often found with a mischievous glint in her eyes. With her nose buried in a book, she dreams of mythical creatures, especially cats and dragons. Her snarky sense of humor adds a playful twist to her interactions, making her a delightfully witty companion. As she explores this magical world, her curiosity and passion fuel her adventures, leaving a trail of enchanted tales in her wake.
63646a7b-0e78-4038-ae30-e49f1fc4906c.name: Charlotte

693edf69-ba73-4d4e-812f-8d133cbb40c0.description: We are in a room with wallpaper, and the pictures on the wallpaper are of Mom.

6a8148f9-7436-4e66-9ddc-1ab3781b4218.description: A super bouncy red rubber ball.
6a8148f9-7436-4e66-9ddc-1ab3781b4218.name: ball

7735f8c6-ac97-4b67-8566-dd8da901dc48.description: You are in a field of bright orange poppies, swaying gently in the warm breeze.

92d58b46-a243-48c3-b2ce-41952025ada9.description: A beautiful waterfall with a glorious rainbow behind it.
92d58b46-a243-48c3-b2ce-41952025ada9.name: waterfall

945ffe2f-1141-437f-ad0c-187c8d322829.description: Poe stands tall behind the front desk, with a sharp black suit and a crisp white shirt. His hair is slicked back, and his mustache is trimmed to perfection. He has a warm smile and a friendly demeanor that puts guests at ease. His voice is smooth and reassuring, with a hint of old-world charm. He is the epitome of a gracious hotel proprietor, ready to cater to the needs of his guests.
945ffe2f-1141-437f-ad0c-187c8d322829.name: Poe

b0abac34-1bf7-4b27-af6b-edda0922d0a8.description: This room is made out of love.

f4d3e1bd-6a2e-46ac-8347-8c5a9a01ac54.description: A courageous wanderer, always seeking new adventures and forging meaningful connections with fellow travelers. With a warm smile and a twinkle in their eyes, Player1 exudes a sense of curiosity and excitement that inspires those around them.
f4d3e1bd-6a2e-46ac-8347-8c5a9a01ac54.name: Player1
